version_description:
Everypony, more colorful adventures await you at the Museum of Friendship!

• NEW ROOMS - The Café of Friendship and the Garden are in need of your design talents to make it fabulous!
• MORE COLORING - Enjoy 200 new memories featuring all your favorite MY LITTLE PONY characters!
• ART STUDIO - Be creative with new paintings in the Art Studio!

Plus we’ve squashed a few bugs to make your adventures more magical than ever!

Everypony! Kick-off the new school year at the Museum of Friendship as more colorful adventures await you.

• NEW ROOM – Welcome to the Equestrian Fashion Exhibit! We’ll need your fabulous design skills to turn this room into a stylish exhibit. So chic!
• NEW MEMORIES – Color 100 new memories featuring all your favorite MY LITTLE PONY characters!
• NEW PAINTINGS – Express yourself with new canvases in the Art Studio! Time to get creative!

Plus, we’ve squashed a few bugs to make your adventures more magical than ever!
A few pesky bugs have been squashed for more colorful adventures!
